# KRWL HOF Development Environment

This project is designed to work out of the box with the provided VS Code and devcontainer
configuration files. Use the workspace file at the repository root to load the recommended
extensions, tasks, and launch settings.

Quick start:

1. Open `krwl-hof.code-workspace` in VS Code.
2. Install dependencies with `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
3. Run `python3 src/event_manager.py generate` to build the site.
